WarriorTraining.name: Warrior Training
WarriorTraining.description: Improve the training and skills of warriors, from basic combat skills to masterful techniques.

ElderWisdom.name: Elder Wisdom
ElderWisdom.description: Increase the wisdom and guidance provided by tribal elders, from basic advice to profound teachings that benefit the entire community.

StorytellingSkills.name: Storytelling Skills
StorytellingSkills.description: Improve your ability to tell traditional stories and legends, enhancing the cultural experience.

SpiritualPower.name: Spiritual Power
SpiritualPower.description: Increase the player's spiritual connection and power, represented by aura or spirit animals that grow stronger and more vibrant.

TribalDance.name: Tribal Dance
TribalDance.description: Upgrade the associated dance moves, from simple foot taps to elaborate traditional dances.

RhythmSkills.name: Rhythm Skills
RhythmSkills.description: Improve the player's drumming techniques and rhythm, starting from basic beats to complex and sophisticated rhythms.

DrumCraftsmanship.name: Drum Craftsmanship
DrumCraftsmanship.description: Enhance the quality and design of the drum, from basic wooden drums to intricately decorated ceremonial drums.

HealerSkills.name: Healer Skills
HealerSkills.description: Develop and enhance traditional healing potions and remedies, from basic herbs to powerful elixirs.

HuntingSkills.name: Hunting Skills
HuntingSkills.description: Upgrade hunting techniques, from simple traps to sophisticated strategies and tools.

ToolCrafting.name: Tool Crafting
ToolCrafting.description: Upgrade the crafting of tools and weapons, from basic stone implements to finely crafted metalwork.

SacredPaintings.name: Sacred Paintings
SacredPaintings.description: Upgrade the artistry of sacred paintings and murals that depict traditional stories and symbols.

FestivalDecorations.name: Festival Decorations
FestivalDecorations.description: Enhance the decorations for festivals and ceremonies, from simple garlands to grand, vibrant setups.

CeremonialDrums.name: Ceremonial Drums
CeremonialDrums.description: Introduce and upgrade special ceremonial drums that have unique designs and sounds.

MusicalEnsemble.name: Musical Ensemble
MusicalEnsemble.description: Add and upgrade other musical instruments that accompany the drum, such as flutes, sitars, and tambourines.

AnimalCompanions.name: Animal Companions
AnimalCompanions.description: Introduce and upgrade animal companions that join the drumming sessions, from birds and rabbits to majestic eagles and tigers.

CostumeAndAccessories.name: Costume & Accessories
CostumeAndAccessories.description: Upgrade the player's attire, from simple clothing to richly decorated traditional costumes with jewelry and accessories.

SpiritualJourneys.name: Spiritual Journeys
SpiritualJourneys.description: Develop the ability to undertake spiritual journeys, from basic meditations to profound vision quests.

MusicComposition.name: Music Composition
MusicComposition.description: Upgrade the ability to compose and perform traditional music, from simple melodies to complex compositions.

MythicalCreatures.name: Mythical Creatures
MythicalCreatures.description: Upgrade interactions with mythical creatures, from simple sightings to forming bonds and gaining their aid.

EnergyManipulation.name: Energy Manipulation
EnergyManipulation.description: Upgrade the ability to manipulate spiritual energy, from basic control to advanced techniques that can influence the environment.
